item.title: Develop Microservice Application Using Spring Boot and MongoDB Database
item.description:
In this article, I will be developing a Microservice Application using Java Technology and Spring Boot Framework, which will be the backend and expose all CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) Operations as the REST APIs.

I will be using No SQL Database known as MongoDB Database for persisting(storing) the data.
